attributes.action: call a General Election as soon as possible
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown, please call a General Election as soon as possible - the only way for a country to democratically elect its Prime Minister (or is this request / petition too 'party political' for this  website?)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
